data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.5 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.3 PB 1
data.actual_result: It is shown below the message.
data.expected_result: Edit info or timestamp should be shown next to the message and not below like it used to be.
data.short_description: Timestamps for system messages and edit info below the message displayed
data.steps_to_repro: - Send any message - Edit it - Observe the edit info - Same can be reproduced with the timestamp for a system message like a join message
